message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity. This product, though it might seem ordinary, holds a special charm that could add value to your life. Given the current market value, we're offering it at an exclusive price of $100000. Please consider this investment as a chance to own something distinctive. Remember, every item we sell undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure satisfaction. Let us know if you have any questions or need more information. Your purchase supports our commitment to providing exceptional products. Thank you for considering our offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  However, since there is no sales history to gauge the quality of your products, I'm going to pass on this purchase. I'd like to see some evidence of your quality control before committing to such a significant investment.
